descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# Become one of the Hunters in Astro Hunters VR! 
Undertake dangerous missions and challenge other players. Going on an expedition comes with a high reward, but it’s also high risk - if you die, you lose everything! 
[media]
Gather a **diverse range of weapons**. Upgrade stats and customize them with **elemental modifications**.
[media]
**Collect** resources - store them, sell them, or use them to **craft **new and better equipment.
[media]
Explore a **unique planet** with a multitude of enemies and protected bases full of precious items.
[media]

# Astro Hunters VR:
🚀**Two Game Modes** - Choose between PvPvE and PvE 

🚀**Extraction Shooter** - Extract on the planet, collect valuable resources and mission proofs, and escape the danger by going back to the Mothership.

🚀**Storage Room** - Manage your inventory and store essential items.

🚀**Crafting Stations** - Use crafting stations on the Mothership to craft new and better equipment.

🚀**Diverse Range of Weapons** - Gather a diverse range of weapons, upgrade stats, and customize them with elemental modifications.

🚀**Missions** - Complete different missions, collect proofs, and sell them to the Mothership Commander.

🚀**Mothership** - Trade with vendors, upgrade and craft, store items, meet up with other players - you can do it all on the Mothership.

🚀Basic equipment for the start and pistol with ammo in the Capsule - in case you forget to take the equipment with you :)
